title: is there a place where i can report a player (not in client)
body:
finally after i waited 3 hours for my client to download (again), i come across a young lad playing jayce
FIRST BLOOD calls the announcer
GG. IM AFK-jayce screams
"a summoner has disconnected"
9 mins later (12 min mark)-Defeat
ty so much for this WONDERFUL match making system. seriously, people who act like this make me sick

replies.body: You could open a ticket about this

Can you guys just stop the leaverbuster low priority queue because it is fucking me up... when my screen just freezes and im trying to get back on or my internet broke out then i return after a period of time it still gives me fucking low priority and i have to wait for so long even if im tryhing my best to reconnect.
As mentioned below, if you didn't hit report in the end of game screen you can do it via a support ticket up the top.

If you have information that the report system cannot see like say, they actively waited for you to start a buff then smite stole it every time, basically in game behaviour, then open a support ticket and provide all the details you can. The report system only sees stats and chat logs (including disconnect logs), it can't see actual in game behaviour.
Support at the top of this web page =)
